questionListItems.title: What is the office hours for the General Office?

answer.body:
The General Office is opened from 7.30am - 5.30pm from Mondays to Fridays.
We are closed on Saturdays, Sundays, and on public holidays.
On the eve of major public holidays, we are opened from 7.30am - 12.00pm.

questionListItems.title: What are the opening hours of the various gates of the school?

answer.body:
Gate A
Mondays to Fridays
6.30 am to 7.00pm

Gate B
Mondays to Fridays
Monday: 
6.30 am to 7.40 am
1.30 pm to 2 pm
2.30 pm to 3 pm

Tuesdays to Fridays
6.30 am to 7.40 am
1.30 pm to 2 pm
Gate B will be locked at 7.45am daily.
Please proceed to Gate A after 7.45am.

questionListItems.title: How do I apply for financial assistance?

answer.body: You may approach the staff at our general office for guidance on how to apply for financial assistance. In the meantime, you could also read up on the eligibility criteria and on more information here

questionListItems.title: How do I apply for the NEU PC Plus Programme?

answer.body: You may approach the staff at our general office for guidance on how to apply for the NEU PC Plus Programme. In the meantime, you could also read up about it here.

questionListItems.title: How do I apply to be a parent volunteer in your school?

answer.body:
In order to qualify as a parent volunteer for registration at Phase 2B of the 2023 Primary One (P1) Registration Exercise, you would have to be registered as a parent volunteer with the school not later than 31 May 2022 and given at least 40 hours of voluntary service to the school by 30 June 2023.
You can approach or contact the general office during office hours to enquire about the parent volunteer scheme.

Click here to download the Parent Volunteer Registration Form

Some important points to note:
Parents may begin their registration two years in advance of the Primary 1 Registration Exercise.
Closing date for registration will be 30th April, one year before the year of the Registration exercise.
However, it is important to note that there is no guarantee of a school place even if a parent volunteer performs the required hours of volunteer work.
